presale.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an agreement to sell a product before it has been completed
presale.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The picture will at worst break even, based on presales of the film for various territories.
presale.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the price someone expects to get for a product, especially one sold at an AUCTION (=an occasion when something is sold to the person willing to pay most for it)
presale.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The doll sold for $5100, more than 5 times its presale estimate of $800/$1000.
